alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:39PM EST until February 19 at 2:55PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rough River near Dundee affecting Ohio County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rough River near Dundee. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, County roads between Dundee and Narrows flood. At 26.0 feet, County roads near Sunnydale flood. At 27.0 feet, KY 919 flood at Underwood and Clifty Huff Roads near Narrows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 26.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 13.1 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.1 feet on 06/29/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
